QuestData.Title: Temporal Investigations
QuestData.Description:
I knew the shal'dorei dabbled in time magic, but this is simply incredible...
Elisande stopped time on our entire army!
Come, let us investigate. Perhaps there is a way to break the spell - or at least discover how it is being maintained.
QuestData.LogDescription: Investigate Elisande's time spell with Khadgar.
QuestData.RewardText: We got lucky that time, but trying again could risk all our lives for nothing. We must find another way.

Objectives.Objective: Help Khadgar investigate the time lock.
